jfxtras.scene.control

Class ImageViewButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • jfxtras.scene.control.ImageViewButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ImageViewButton
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView

    An ImageView which lets the mouse change so it indicates being clickable
